name: Open with VSCode
description: Enable you to open a file or folder directly with VSCode. Then, you can start coding immediately. If you haven't installed VSCode, it will let you quickly get the VSCode installer and guide you to accomplish the installation in a short time.

apps.name: VSCode
apps.description: Enable you to open a file or folder directly with VSCode. Then, you can start coding immediately. If you haven't installed VSCode, it will let you quickly get the VSCode installer and guide you to accomplish the installation in a short time.

subname: Quickly open the target file or folder with VSCode.
